channel.title: Cash Dividends on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Cash Dividends on FinanClub

item.title: PR
item.description: score:1257 Chances: Permian Resources announces Q2 2023 financial and operational results. Board declares quarterly base and variable cash dividends for Class A common stock. Investors invited to participate in earnings conference call regarding Q2 results. Pickering Energy Partners co-manages secondary public offering for Permian Resources.
